trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANANA605_03068_SEQ_00<tab>Eshana requests your help with preparing a balm for the infirmary.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANANA605_03068_TODO_00<tab>Obtain chunks of mudstone from Mirage Creek.
TEXT_BANANA605_03068_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the chunks of mudstone to Eshana.
TEXT_BANANA605_03068_ESHANA_000_000<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. No pressing emergencies at the moment, but the infirmary could use a hand if you're willing.

TEXT_BANANA605_03068_ESHANA_000_001<tab>There's a problem with bugs, you sssee─the biting, ssstinging kind. Our sssentries finish their watches covered in weltsss, and we cannot ignore the effect thisss may have on morale.

TEXT_BANANA605_03068_ESHANA_000_002<tab>Even the ssstrongest incense won't keep all the insssects away, but mudssstone can be ground into a passste that sssoothes the worssst of the itching. Might you bring me three or ssso chunksss? You'll find despositsss of the ssstuff in the waters of Mirage Creek.
TEXT_BANANA605_03068_ESHANA_000_010<tab>Were you able to locate any mudssstone depositsss?
TEXT_BANANA605_03068_ESHANA_000_011<tab>Yesss, these should do nicely. Once applied, the balm worksss to alleviate any irritation almossst immediately.
TEXT_BANANA605_03068_ESHANA_000_012<tab>It is a traditional remedy of ours, passed down through generations.

TEXT_BANANA605_03068_ESHANA_000_013<tab>We do alssso have an alchemical sssalve made by your people which heals the bites themssselves, but it is in short sssupply. I would rather sssave it for the mossst sssevere cases, and rely on mudssstone for daily use.
